mapper.select: SELECT product_number,product_name,product_content,product_company,product_origin,product_image,product_price,to_char(product_regdate,'YYYY-mm-DD') product_regdate FROM products_tb ORDER BY product_number

SELECT product_number,product_name,product_content,product_company,product_origin,product_image,product_price,to_char(product_regdate,'YYYY-mm-DD') product_regdate FROM products_tb where product_number = #{product_number}
mapper.insert: insert into products_tb( PRODUCT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_COMPANY, PRODUCT_ORIGIN, PRODUCT_IMAGE, ADMIN_NUMBER, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_REGDATE) values(seq_product_tb.nextval,#{product_name},#{product_content},#{product_company},#{product_origin},#{product_image},'2',#{product_price},sysdate)
